channel.title: Web3 Startup Raise News in Last 24 Hours

item.title: RISC Zero Raises $40 Million To Develop A Scalable Blockchain
item.description: Zero-knowledge proof startup RISC Zero has raised $40 million in a Series A funding round led by Blockchain Capital, according to press materials shared...
